thread.title: 'Back to the Future' trilogy big screen finale at Becky's Drive In
thread.title_full: 'Back to the Future' trilogy big screen finale at Becky's Drive In - The Morning Call

author: mcall.com
title: 'Back to the Future' trilogy big screen finale at Becky's Drive In
text:
Revisit the world of Marty McFly and Doc Brown on Saturday night when Becky's Drive In in Walnutport presents back to back screenings of all three "Back to the Future" movies.
Celebrations have been going on around the country in honor of the 30th anniverary of the release of the first film. And Oct. 21 was the celebrated day that Marty McFly traveled to in the future in "Back to the Future Part II."
Gates will open at 5 p.m. for the screenings. "Back to the Future" screens at 7 p.m.; "Back to the Future Part II" at 9:15 p.m. and "Back to the Future Part III" at 11:10 p.m. The movies are rated PG.
A DeLorean will be on display. Anyone dressed from "Back to the Future" will receive a coupon for a free hot dog and soda.
This is the season finale for Becky's. Also showing on Screen 2: "Goosebumps" (7:05 p.m.) and "Hotel Transylvania 2" (9 p.m.).
Tickets: $9; $6, ages 3-12. Info: www.beckysdi.com , 610-767-2249.
â€” Jodi Duckett
